hero.title: Understanding Hydrogen's Impact on Climate
hero.subtitle: HIWAI is a pioneering research project investigating how hydrogen emissions affect atmospheric chemistry and contribute to climate change. Our work bridges science and policy to shape a sustainable hydrogen economy.

features.title: Hydrogen Emissions Research
features.description: Quantifying hydrogen emissions from natural and anthropogenic sources to understand their atmospheric concentrations and trends.

features.title: Climate Impact Assessment
features.description: Analyzing how hydrogen influences atmospheric chemistry, including its effects on methane lifetime and stratospheric water vapor.

features.title: Atmospheric Modeling
features.description: Developing and applying state-of-the-art models to simulate hydrogen cycling and predict future climate scenarios.

features.title: Policy Guidance
features.description: Translating scientific findings into actionable recommendations for policymakers and industry stakeholders.

latestNews.title: HIWAI Project Launches
latestNews.excerpt: We are excited to announce the official launch of the HIWAI research project...
